attributes.action:
Don't Force esa to Look for Work
And support us more
attributes.additional_details:
So please sign this petition
If you haven't seen what's happens with esa 
Just type esa working in Google for more information
If you have any queries 
Follow me on Twitter 
@Firedudecod
attributes.background:
David Cameron as prime minister has picked on the sick and variable people who have short term lives or people are medically ill or have special needs like ADHD 
Dyslexia etc and also people who have epilepsy 
This needs to change back what esa used to be for and not what it is currently for
